document.full_text: tim pawlenty, a former minnesota governor, became the first candidate in the republican field. mr. pawlenty announced an exploratory committee through a video on his facebook page.
document.title: ex-governor of minnesota enters race for president
lines_and_colors: tim pawlenty, a former minnesota governor, became the first candidate in the republican field. mr. pawlenty announced an exploratory committee through a video on his facebook page.
